title: Silicon Valley Internal Resistance: Employee Organizing Against Authoritarian Collaboration
description: Document the timeline of tech worker organizing within major technology companies to resist collaboration with authoritarian government requests and surveillance programs.
research_areas: Which specific tech companies faced significant internal employee resistance?
What dates mark major employee walkouts or resignations over government collaboration?
How did tech executives respond to employee resistance movements?
What specific government contracts or requests triggered employee organizing?
source_requirements: Employee communications, corporate policy documents, government contract details, resignation letters
pdf_source: Technology Worker Resistance and Constitutional Cryptography_ Tools for Democratic Resilience.pdf
